briefTitle: A 38 Week Trial Comparing Effect and Safety of Insulin Degludec/Insulin Aspart vs. Insulin Glargine Plus Insulin Aspart in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Treated With Basal Insulin With or Without Oral Antidiabetic Treatment in Need of Treatment Intensification
officialTitle: This Trial is Conducted Globally. The Aim of This Trial is to Compare the Effect and Safety of Insulin Degludec/Insulin Aspart vs. Insulin Glargine Plus Insulin Aspart in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Treated With Basal Insulin With or Without Oral Antidiabetic Treatment in Need of Treatment Intensification.
summary: Trial comparing effect and safety of insulin degludec/insulin aspart vs. insulin glargine plus insulin aspart in subjects with type 2 diabetes treated with basal insulin with or without oral antidiabetic treatment in need of treatment intensification.
